programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Arasi has reconnected with Aiden but it seems he can't escape the influence of Tobias. Sarah struggles with survivors guilt. Rose, encouraged by Haresh, makes a major decision regarding her mental health.

programme.title: New Amsterdam S1
programme.desc: Dr. Reynolds confronts a difficult episode from his past. Max distracts himself from chemotherapy by taking on the case of a frequent-flyer patient. Dr. Frome helps a young man suffering from severe delusions. Dr. Sharpe worries about Dr. Bloom's attempt to detox.

programme.title: America's Got Talent: Extreme
programme.desc: America's Got Talent: Extreme is an American reality television and talent competition series created by Simon Cowell. The series is a spinoff of America's Got Talent that focuses on stunt performers. Showcasing the most outrageous, unique and jaw-dropping acts of enormous scale and magnitude that simply can't be confined to a theater stage.

programme.title: Celebrity Family Feud
programme.desc: The classic Family Feud format has entertained a generation, and this hilarious celebrity reboot sees Emmy-award winning talk show host Steve Harley at the helm, as your favourite celebrities and their families play the game, thinking on their feet and trying to second guess the general public.

programme.title: Arts 21
programme.desc: ARTS 21 is an arts magazine show focusing on the latest news and events on the culture scene.

programme.title: Inside The Box With Jack Stein
programme.desc: Jack begins in the British Library where Polly has found some relevant and inspiring recipes dating back to the late 1700's. Then Jack is back in his Cornwall kitchen to tempt tastebuds with his own take on the simply decadent Potted Shrimp recipe, before landing in Darwin at Australia's tropical top end to find out it's not shrimp season! Without access to the hero of his dish, Jack must decide the alternative meat to choose between Mudcrab and Crocodile!

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S40

programme.title: Freshly Picked With Simon Toohey S2
programme.desc: A quick and easy tofu dish is on the menu for any day of the week, and Simon delivers a dessert that's as simple as it is sensational. Connor Curran is back on the show for a vegan Moussaka, and Simon heads to the river for the perfect toastie.

programme.title: Jamie's Easy Meals For Every Day
programme.desc: Join Jamie at home with his family in Essex for delicious, family-focused food for real life, every day In this brand new series, we join the nation's favourite chef at his country home, where he's cooking up tasty, healthy recipes from his new book 7 Ways: Easy Ideas for Every Day of the Week. Inspired by his own home cooking, based around simple, crowd-pleasing family meals that are creative but pressure-free, Jamie mostly uses 8 ingredients or less, with plenty of versatility.

programme.title: Animals At Play
programme.desc: A team of scientists and experts takes us around the world to meet the wild animals that love to have fun as they ask three big questions....why do animals play, could animals have a sense of fun and what can animal play tell us about ourselves. In recent years, these extreme weather events have become more and more commonplace.
